page.title: 15THE CRUMLIN LIBRARY
page.content: The Library is situated just off Crumlin's main street,on a road called Orchard Road.The Library is a modern building built quite recently in 1977.The Library is efficiently run by two very kind ladies called{Miss {Sullivan}and{Mrs Graham. There are about ten to eleven thousand books.They are divided into various sections (A)Irish (B)Childrens (C)Fiction (D)Reference (E)Large print books.They also have available, Newspapers and Jornals.A train and bus timetable service is provided and there is a noticeboard in the hall way displaying local job vacancies. Overall the library provide's an essential service to this community.
